resources.string: Set Digipaws as the default launcher to access this option
Enable General Accessibility Service to access this option
Enable App Blocker Accessibility Service to manage app blocking
Enable View Blocker Accessibility Service to manage view blocking
Enable Keyword Blocker Accessibility Service to manage blocked keywords
Enable Usage Tracker Accessibility Service to manage trackers
Your average attention span was %2$d mins
Specify duration of focus mode in mins
Allow viewing instagram reels sent in Instagram inbox
Allow opening the first reel in feed
Block all uninstall attempts for a specified number of days.
Block all uninstall attempts until the anti-uninstall protection is removed with a password
Make sure not to forget this password. You may not be able to exit anti-uninstall without it.
How long would you like to keep anti-uninstall enabled?

Enabling this would unlock the following in DigiPaws:
1. App Blocking

 DigiPaws needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets DigiPaws block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

Enabling this would unlock the following in DigiPaws:
1. View Blocking
2. Block Instagram reels,Tikok and Youtube shorts

 DigiPaws needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets DigiPaws block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

THIS FEATURE REQUIRES DISPLAY OVER OTHER APPS (DRAW OVER OTHER APPS) PERMISSION TO WORK. PLEASE ENABLE IT FIRST AND THEN ENABLE THIS. RESTART IF SERVICE MALFUNCTIONS.


Enabling this would unlock the following in DigiPaws:
1. Count number of reels scrolled
2. Calculate average attention span watching those reels
3. A floating overlay that shows time elapsed

 DigiPaws needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets DigiPaws block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

Enabling this would unlock the following in DigiPaws:
1. Block custom keywords
2. Block content like adult material

 DigiPaws needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets DigiPaws block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

Enabling this would unlock the following in DigiPaws:
1. Focus Mode: block distraction until a set period of time.
2. Anti-Uninstall (Setup required to run)

 DigiPaws needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets DigiPaws block those features for you based on your preferences, helendping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.
Please provide device admin permission to access this feature
End time must be after start time has passed!
You still have %1$d days to go before unlocking anti-uninstall
You had an attention span of %1$.2f seconds/video
Failed to launch system digital wellbeing
Please Select a few apps to block
Please wait %1$d seconds before pressing proceed

DigiPaws uses the Accessibility permission to provide features like app monitoring and usage tracking to enhance your experience. This permission allows DigiPaws to detect app activities and help manage device usage effectively. Rest assured, all data is processed locally on your device and is never sent to any server or third party. Your privacy and data security are our top priorities.
Perform actions like a back press
DigiPaws uses Device Admin permission to enhance security and block uninstalling digipaws until a specific period. All data remains securely stored on your device and is never shared externally.
Prevent uninstallation attempts until a set condition is met

DigiPaws uses the "Display over other apps" permission to show a small floating overlay on the screen. This overlay tracks the number of reels watched and the time spent, helping users be more aware of their usage in real time.
Calculate how many reels/ tiktok/ short videos you scroll per day
Please provide display over other apps permission to access this feature
Are you sure you want to discard all changes and exit?
If you enable this, you won\'t be able to change configurations such as adding blocked apps, keywords, and more until you remove anti-uninstall.
ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO TURN ON ANTI UNINSTALL? There is no turning back...
